name: The St. Christopher's School Lockdown
blurb: A point-and-click adventure game set within a British private school. When a political protest turns violent, whose side will you take?

rewards.reward: PROTESTER -- You will receive a FREE digital DRM-free copy of the pilot episode upon release. This means you're paying half the price of its actual retail value!

SUPPORTER -- Your name will be mentioned in the game credits (from the demo, through to the very last episode), and you will receive a high quality desktop wallpaper (you can even specify the precise dimensions)!

STUDENT -- Your name and personal photo (or, if you prefer, a representative avatar image selected by you, within reason) will be featured on our web site's Hall of Fame, as well as the previous rewards.

REPORTER -- A free digital copy of each episode upon release, as well as an invitation to a monthly developer's chat session (beginning in August 2013 all the way through until release) AND access to certain early alpha/beta builds, as well as all previous rewards.

HOOLIGAN -- Your name will be listed within the in-game school database as a St. Christopher's student, along with a record of your academic achievements and/or set-backs, and an assessment of your behavior. You will, of course, have as much input into this as you desire, and it will include a single, basic character portrait. Includes all previous rewards.

RUMORMONGER -- A scandalous article about you will be featured within the in-game gossip blog, "Classified". You will have full input into which "secrets" will be revealed about you (and it will all be done in a tasteful and tongue-in-cheek manner, we promise), and a "candid" drawing of you will be featured alongside the written piece. Includes all rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier.

LEGACY -- An entire wing/building of the St. Christopher's campus will be named after you! A commemorative plaque will be prominently featured within it, as well as a classically styled, framed portrait. Includes all rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier.

FASHION VICTIM -- You will receive a very stylish limited edition T-shirt, a signed hand-drawn, toned and inked 8"x8" portrait of yourself by the lead game artist, and all of the rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier.

REVOLUTIONARY -- Be a character in the game itself! You will work with our project lead to design a unique NPC, which can be based on you, a family member, one of your original characters... There will be certain restrictions, but we will do our best to give you as much freedom as possible, and even allow you to come up with some of your own dialogue! You will be featured in the game credits as "Character Consultant". Includes all rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier.

INTERIOR DESIGNER -- Work one-on-one with our environmental artist to design a room within the St. Christopher's campus (within reason)! Whether it be an English classroom, a locker room, a counselor's office-- we will be entirely open to your ideas and suggestions! You will also receive a special title within the game credits as "Environmental Consultant". Includes all rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier.

ACTION FIGURE -- You get to work one-on-one with our project lead on the design of one of the trading/battle game voodoo dolls! It can be based on you, it can be based on your best friend, it can be based on your D&D character-- you will have a lot of freedom with this, even in terms of determining its combat stats. You will be featured in the credits as "Voodoo Master". Includes all rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier.

LOVER -- Become a central part of one of our episodes. YOU will be written into the script as the former lover of one of our playable protagonists, and will be brought up in his/her conversations, have featured e-mails and text messages show up within the game, and will work together with the project lead on determining exactly how you will be depicted as a character! Includes all rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier, as well as a customized T-shirt featuring your character alongside his or her former lover.

HERO -- One of the six main playable protagonists will share YOUR last name, and part of his or her main outfit design will involve a T-shirt with your picture on it! You will also become a character within the first episode with an entire sub-plot revolving around you, which you will work on together with our team members. Help us set the tone for the entire game! Your name will be THE ONLY NAME listed in the credits under "Extra Special Thanks" (sorry, grandma!). Includes all rewards up until (and including) the REPORTER tier.
